name: Octopus Necklace - Purple
description:
This quirky octopus necklace has been laser cut out of 3mm acrylic, hand painted with tiny beads which have been individually glued to the edge of the octopus. It has then been varnished to seal the beads and add a glossy finish. 
There was only one of this beautiful purple octopus necklace made.

Measurements:
Otopus Approx.: 4.9 x 4.7cms
Chain Length Approx.: 45 - 47cms

*Please Note that all Riggi Design pieces are individual, even though they are laser cut each piece has been painted, glossed, sanded or drilled by hand making each one slightly different.*

Care:
To protect your piece, store and transport your jewellery in its box.
Try not to crush your jewellery when wearing it.
Please keep all types of water, perfume and lotions away from your jewellery (these can discolour or damage parts)
